name: Mibbit - Remove extraneous stuff
description: Removes the timestamps and Mibbit header
additional_info: This style takes away the header (which includes the login / register links) and timestamps. If you want to see them, you can remove line 6 and make them show up. Remove line 12 if you never use those tab switch arrows; They'll disappear behind the chat window. Update 04/05/14 Removed :last-child from line 11. Update 09/22/18 Added fixes for tabs, especially handy for tabs on left. Update 09/22/18 Removed experimental code, and timestamp hiding as you can disable the time column in Mibbit after registering for an account.
